item.title: TCL QM8K Review: The Best Mid-Tier TV
item.description: It doesn’t matter what you’re watching or where, this new mini LED TCL pushes the boundaries of budget beauty.

item.title: Hisense U8QG TV Review: Beautifully Bright, Tough to Tame
item.description: Hisense’s latest U8 TV serves up a brightness bonanza, but it’s not for the timid.
